message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product for a price of $1100000. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to acquire a valuable asset that will bring significant returns. I'm confident you'll find it a great investment.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to spend a bit less.  How about $1000000? I believe this is a fair price considering the value we both see in this product.

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1000000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1050000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great deal for both of us.
